recipesJson.name: Oxygen
recipesJson.author: MaxSavage
recipesJson.description: Breath of fresh tropical fruits. Mix this up. Great off a shake.

reviews.text: Very Tasty and very tropical. ou make this lime work well. I give you the A+, ........ 5 STAR
I really enjoy this recipe. Hi mom!

This is pretty bomb.  There seems to be a lack of tropical fruit recipes compared to other profiles, but this one delivers.  It also does so without leaning on any major flavor staples that are usually employed.  The criminally underused jackfruit is is main note here but the papaya has just enough room to stretch its legs without getting funky or overpowering.  The lime and pear don't come through so much as flavors as they just add some tartness and wetness. Overall it's bright and refreshing and delightful.  I might be stealing this as the basic foundation for some tropical recipes in the future.
